title: Simulator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, pick another player, and simulate a game of Grand Idea Mafia.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The simulation will use the players and roles of the current game, as they were at the beginning of the game.
- Simulated players will choose random targets if in possession of no relevant information, or make the best plays available to them, as determined by the host. This includes "claiming" during the day and hanging players.
- When your ability resolves, you will learn the players who were alive at the end of the game, and whether or not the player you chose won.
- The full events of every game you simulated will be published when the game ends, for funsies.
- You may only simulate three games.
